credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk, metal threads
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
description: Rose ribbed silk brocaded in polychrome silks, chenille and gold and silver metal threads with floral sprays, drapery and cushions.
